forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning with showers during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 7C. ESE winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low near 45F. ESE winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 49F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
